document.masterDocTitle: A new species of Halictophagus (Insecta: Strepsiptera: Halictophagidae) from Texas, and a checklist of Strepsiptera from the United States and Canada

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A new species of Halictophagus (Insecta: Strepsiptera: Halictophagidae) from Texas, and a checklist of Strepsiptera from the United States and Canada

heading.emphasis: List of Strepsiptera from U.S.A. and Canada , with distribution and host records

subSubSection.paragraph:
There has been no comprehensive list of Strepsiptera from USA and Canada since
Kinzelbach ( 1971 )
, and one is provided here.

Kathirithamby & Peck 1994
: 128
